text: "Leave a Trace" is a 2015 song by the Scottish synth-pop band Chvrches. It is the first single from their second studio album Every Open Eye which was released in 2015. ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2015) Peak position Australia (ARIA)"ARIA Report". Issue 1327. ARIA. Retrieved 25 April 2016. 64 Australia Hitseekers (ARIA) 3 Switzerland Airplay (Swiss Hitparade) 82 UK Singles (Official Charts Company)"CHART: CLUK Update 25.07.2015 (wk30)". zobbel.de. Retrieved 25 April 2016. 107 US Hot Singles Sales (Billboard) 15 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2015) Position US Hot Rock Songs (Billboard) 86 ==References== Category:2015 songs Category:Chvrches songs
title: Leave a Trace
